title: An Illustration of basic film editing principles
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Editing
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching
description: Leon Barsha of the American Cinema Editors has taken a sequence from the motion picture "Baby Face Nelson" to illustrate film editing techniques. Actors Mickey Rooney, Sir Cedric Hardwicke and Carolyn Jones are shown from our angle as on a stage. Then Leon Barsha shows how the same scene was heightened in mood and drama by editing with use of inserts - two shots, close-ups and extreme close-ups.
